- If the holiday is on a Monday, 
    - you can take Friday or Tuesday off to turn 1 day of PTO to 4 consecutive days of vacation
    - otherwise you get 3 consecutive days of vacation
- If the holiday is on a Tuesday, 
    - take Monday off gives you 4 consecutive days of vacation
    - otherwise you get 1 day off in the middle of the week
- If the holiday is on a Wednesday, 
    - take the whole week off (4 days of PTO) gives you 9 consectutive days of vacation. 
    - take Monday & Tuesday off or Thursday & Friday off to get 5 consecutive days of vacation.
    - otherwise you get 1 day off in the middle of the week
- If the holiday is on a Thursday, 
    - take Friday off gives you 4 consecutive days of vacation
    - otherwise you get 1 day off in the middle of the week
- If the holiday is on a Friday, 
    - take Thursday or Monday off off to get 4 consecutive days of vacation.
    - otherwise you get 3 consecutive days of vacation
